from notebookutils import mssparkutils

# Builds protected characteristic DIMs
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/diversity_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/disability_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/religion_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/sxo_dim')
# Builds protected characteristic FACT
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/secureinfo_fact') #-- where is it?

# Builds employee DIMS
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/employee_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/PersonnelArea_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/PersonnelSubArea_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/EmployeeLeavers_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/WorkSchedule_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Specialism_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/LeaveEntitlement_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Absence_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/contract_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/payband_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/position_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/PINS_Location_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/OrganisationUnit_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/CostCenter_Dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Employee_HR_Hierarchy_Dim')

# Build full FACT table
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/HR_Record_Fact')
